website_summaries.verdict: All-day wear from an eco-chic, cruelty-free brand.
pros: From a line made with long-wearing Amazonian clay and other minerals
Colors blend on smoothly and lightly, or can build up for a bolder look
cons: Product is thick, so it can be hard to load onto the brush

customer_reviews.title: Not for olive skin
customer_reviews.text: A lot lighter than it appears here. I am olive skinned and usually wear a terra cotta type color -- but this is pink. Also, there is a shimmer to the material which I don't like, almost looks like glitter in the sun. I wanted plain matte.
customer_reviews.author: Sinny

customer_reviews.title: Tarte
customer_reviews.text: Long Wear and goes on light, so you may need a couple of layers. It doesn't last all day, but maybe if I used a makeup setting spray it would. Either way, for the price, I highly recommend it and Tarte's product line.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise
customer_reviews.text: Although this color is more peach than I would normally buy, it really is a great product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The blush for summer.
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful summer blush. Makes you look healthy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised on how fast it was delivered and how lovely the blush is. Pretty shade and it lasts. Honestly, did receive compliments about my pinkish cheeks. I am fair skin with dark brown, mahogany hair. I have no regrets in buying this item!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great color and long lasting blush for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: I have a very fair skin tone, green eyes, and blonde hair. This blush is perfect for those of use with a fair complexion. You will discover that a little goes a way, and it lasts for a work day. Used sparely, I love this blush. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great blush with staying power
customer_reviews.text: The color of this product is a little darker than I thought but it goes on beautifully and lasts all day long. Using a softer brush helped me to lighten up the look of it. It is highly pigmented and it will last you forever.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Brindisi

customer_reviews.title: great blush and highly pigmented
customer_reviews.text: I can`t believe it I got this one for $8, great blush and highly pigmented, you only need a little bit and once in a day
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Very natural looking
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning I did not care for this blush. But I kept using it and now I just love it. Will order again. It blends so nice and looks very natural.
customer_reviews.author: skd

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: just like the reviews said great blush I would definitely buy more from this line was able to wear this all day without a touch up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best blush I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: The best blush I have ever purchased. I am in love with the color, packaging, and pigmentation. It is so amazing. It's my fit's high end blush, I will be buying more, I recommend buying these
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blush!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice blush. I love the color.The price was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: ... have tried a few of their blushes and I enjoy them all
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few of their blushes and I enjoy them all. This is a nice neutral pink that most people should be able to wear. It goes on easy and can be layered and blended. This blush stays on and looks great even after a long-day at work.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: My favorite blush!
customer_reviews.text: This blush I gorgeous! It lasts so long on the skin and feels so smooth. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C

customer_reviews.title: I rock this blush all day long without reapplying OR aggravating my acne
customer_reviews.text: My fave blush. The pink shade looks good on my fair cheeks. You really can rock this all day without having to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: EziePeezie

product_meta.title: Tarte Amazonian Clay 12-Hour Blush Charisma 0.2 oz
product_meta.description: A long-wearing, solar-baked blush that lasts up to 12 hours.What it does: Infused with natural clay harvested from the banks of the Amazon River and naturally baked by the sun, this nutrient-rich blush benefits all skin types for a fade-free flawless finish for an amazing 12 hours. Inspired by Tarte's best-selling shades of cheek stains and lip tints, the colors range from soft to vivid to suit a wide variety of skintones. For oily skin types, Amazonian clay minimizes oil in and around pores to balance skin and keep product in place. Those with dry skin will benefit from the clay's nourishing and hydrating properties, which naturally restore skin's moisture. Combination skin types can rely on its ability to zero in on skin concerns and deliver benefits to restore complexion harmony.
feature_bullets: A Long-wearing, Solar-baked Blush That Lasts Up To 12 Hours.
Infused With Natural Clay Harvested From The Banks Of The Amazon River And Naturally Baked By The Sun.
Infused With Natural Clay Harvested From The Banks Of The Amazon River And Naturally Baked By The Sun.
Best-selling Shades Of Cheek Stains And Lip Tints, The Colors Range From Soft To Vivid To Suit A Wide Variety Of Skintones.
For Oily Skin Types, Amazonian Clay Minimizes Oil In And Around Pores To Balance Skin And Keep Product In Place.
